nodes.title: Note：About API Node
widgets_values:
[About API Node](https://docs.comfy.org/tutorials/api-nodes/overview) - [Pricing](https://docs.comfy.org/tutorials/api-nodes/pricing)
 
To use the API, you must be in a secure network environment:

- Allows access from `127.0.0.1` or `localhost`.

- Use our API Node in website services starting with `https`

- Make sure you can normally connect to our API services (some regions may need a proxy).

- Make sure you are logged in in the settings and that your account still has enough credits to cover the consumption of API calls.

- On non-whitelisted sites or local area networks (LANs), please try to [log in using an API Key](https://docs.comfy.org/interface/user#logging-in-with-an-api-key).

A subway train screeches to a halt in a dim underground station, sparks flying from the tracks as buskers’ drums echo against the tiled walls.
A towering wave crashes against jagged cliffs, spray exploding into the air while gulls scream overhead and the rumble of water shakes the rocks.
A juggler drops a glass ball on a cobblestone street, the orb bouncing and rolling noisily as onlookers gasp and a street violinist keeps playing.
A thunderstorm erupts over a desert canyon, lightning splitting the sky as the boom of thunder rolls endlessly between the cliffs.
A skateboarder grinds down a long metal rail, sparks flying as wheels rattle, before landing hard with a thud and cheers from friends echoing under a bridge.
A deer sprints through a frosted meadow, hooves crunching the snow as a sudden gunshot cracks in the distance and crows scatter noisily from trees.
A crystal glass tips in slow motion, shattering across a marble floor with sharp echoes while a piano in the next room continues to play faintly.
A carnival ride spins wildly under neon lights, children’s laughter mixing with the blare of trumpets and the metallic creak of machinery.
A flock of flamingos rise from a shallow lagoon at sunrise, wings beating in a thunder of feathers as water splashes in unison and frogs croak loudly.
A busy kitchen explodes with sound: knives chopping, pots clanging, a pan sizzling as steam hisses, while a chef shouts over the chaos.
